overlay.disputeResolution: Delaware Court of Chancery or arbitration under AAA rules

clauses.vestingLanguage: Founder shares shall vest pursuant to Section 83 of the Internal Revenue Code and may be subject to 83(b) election.
clauses.ipAssignment: All work product and inventions created during employment are works made for hire and vest in the Corporation.
clauses.taxNotice: Founders are strongly advised to file an 83(b) election within 30 days of receiving restricted stock to minimize tax liability.
clauses.companyFormation: Company incorporated as a Delaware C-Corporation under Title 8 of the Delaware Code.
clauses.section409A: Stock options must comply with IRC Section 409A to avoid adverse tax consequences.

specialProvisions.section83b: An 83(b) election must be filed with the IRS within 30 days of vesting commencement to recognize income at current (low) valuation.
specialProvisions.qualifiedSmallBusiness: Stock may qualify for QSBS (Qualified Small Business Stock) under IRC ยง1202 providing capital gains tax exclusion.
